description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref 18/14294/FUL dated 30/05/2019 (Demolition of the existing detached bungalow and erection of two 5 bedroom detached houses, with associated vehicle access, off street parking & landscaping) involving amendment to front elevation only of proposed brick headers to be replaced by cast stone surround in light grey
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please submit a copy of a site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
